title: New Champ is already in the client. Reveal is on 11/19

replies.body: I hope we get finally a traditional mage and not another zoe :)

> [{quoted}](name=x Wyvern x,realm=EUW,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=V1EAGu9k,comment-id=0006,timestamp=2018-11-13T16:58:46.708+0000)
>
> I hope we get finally a traditional mage and not another zoe :)

honestly I think we're at the point ith champions that we wont be getting traditional anything anymore like every new champ is going to bring something new to the table each time whether it be new cc or some map altering mechanic because as much as people say they want a traditional champ its just going to be compared to some other champ in the game and be seen as a better X champion or a worse Y champion. And people will use that as a reason to justify a rework or buffs/nerfs

> [{quoted}](name=zaire90,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=V1EAGu9k,comment-id=00060000,timestamp=2018-11-13T17:16:33.139+0000)
>
> honestly I think we're at the point ith champions that we wont be getting traditional anything anymore like every new champ is going to bring something new to the table each time whether it be new cc or some map altering mechanic because as much as people say they want a traditional champ its just going to be compared to some other champ in the game and be seen as a better X champion or a worse Y champion. And people will use that as a reason to justify a rework or buffs/nerfs

Kai'Sa and Pyke weren't too unfamiliar. Kai'Sa was specifically designed to be an alternative to Vayne's assassin mobile ADC playstyle, and Pyke plays like a lot of assassins, just with enough cc and the gold share on his ultimate to work as a support too.

I sorta agree with Kai'sa, but Pyke is pretty damn unique, probably the most distinct character weve had since Ivern.   Even Kai'Sa has the distinction of being a true hybrid adc as in you are actively encouraged to dip into both damage types.
I thought kayn was really unique, getting to choose between 2 different endgame forms
And going a tad further back, while Rakan makes the duo very unique, Xayah is a really plain and simple ADC.
Please don't make it to be another CertainlyT champ....
While this Champ was designed by SolCrushed, CertainlyT is indeed working on a new Champ, but that's very far off

> [{quoted}](name=Reav3,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=V1EAGu9k,comment-id=000f0000,timestamp=2018-11-13T20:03:53.669+0000)
>
>  CertainlyT is indeed working on a new Champ

Oh fuck no :/
"OH NO A CHAMPION WHO HAS A 43% WINRATE IN MY RANK WHATEVER SHALL I DO??"

Idk which champ you're referencing but most of his champs tend to be annoying to deal with, even if they aren't the strongest.

{{champion:122}} {{champion:412}} {{champion:143}} {{champion:104}} {{champion:51}} {{champion:84}} {{champion:142}}  and nobody can forget {{champion:157}}
Well... At least thresh is actually hype and pre-rework graves was good.
He designed the Graves rework, not the original (to my knowledge).
You forgot Warwick.{{champion:19}}
Thats the only decent rework he made.Others are just broken with overloaded kits.

I was basically picking out a lot of the ones I find to be most annoying to deal with, especially when someone good is controlling them, ww doesn't ever feel too overloaded  but that might just be me.
I mean, if we wanna just talk about champions that are annoying when someone good is controlling them, a lot more than just CT champs fit that list

It's just that CT champs feel like the worst offenders here.

{{champion:157}} with a passive that doubles crit chance+gives a shield, good damage q+knockup every third one (short cooldown as well), blocks every single champion projectile ever with w, infinite mobility in minion waves, ult that locks someone down then deals good damage+resets shield+gives penetration on crits (easy to reach 100%)

{{champion:84}} that can literally turn invisible and make anyone that relies on clicking useless (even under tower), also deals good damage with insane mobility when she hits her abilities.

{{champion:412}} can easily get a kill on any squishy or protect his own squishies since he has a strong stun/hook/dash, shield/pull allies, knockback, area slow ult and plenty of survivability for himself during all of this.

{{champion:143}} can poke with plants when an adc goes to cs, also capable of dealing super high damage all game.

{{champion:142}} lands a bubble through a wall and you can count yourself dead if you don't have qss available, (bubble is up much more often) can also deal massive damage with a long ranged q onto anyone, has an ult that can get her in range for a long q and then get her back to safety.

I could say more but my point is basically that any of the CT champs can be incredibly unfun to deal with, there is counterplay possible but it just makes the game boring to go against one of them.
You also forgot {{champion:429}}.

Like I said to someone else, I just really picked out the ones I find to be most annoying.
Don't really fight {{champion:429}} enough to make a judgement.
how 'bout never?
Thank god, by the time it's released  I will have already quit.

this gave me a good chuckle cause... joking or not, if the game continues as is, and if they continue to let certainlyT run free-reign and go full 12-year-old-original-deviantart-character mode, I'll definitely have quit by then too.

> [{quoted}](name=Reav3,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=V1EAGu9k,comment-id=000f0000,timestamp=2018-11-13T20:03:53.669+0000)

This new "colorful mage" is designed by SolCrushed, so is it safe to assume CT is working on the chained champion (considering he has always been making unprecendented kits)

;)
The Chained Champ is being designed by Squad5

> [{quoted}](name=Reav3,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=V1EAGu9k,comment-id=000f0000001a0000,timestamp=2018-11-15T00:10:09.363+0000)

Thx, good to know
 
*cause that means theres _another_ new champion following the colorful mage :D
There will be several New Champions before the one CertainlyT is working on. His is still a long way off
Nope :)
Who's reworking Kayle and Morgana?
RiotAugust
Oh thank god.

Why, though? Why do you guys let CT keep making champions when you know people hate dealing with his champion designs? At least sit him down and tell him to make something that isn't overloaded BEFORE he get's started, ffs!

> [{quoted}](name=Reav3,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=V1EAGu9k,comment-id=000f0000,timestamp=2018-11-13T20:03:53.669+0000)

Don't do this to us. Let us vote - survivor his ass.

Well he did make Viktor and Galio rework which imo are both good design-wise. Irelia and Akali are bull crap tho (Why is it that Ionia has SO MANY toxic to play against champs? {{champion:103}} {{champion:84}} {{champion:39}} {{champion:11}} {{champion:157}} {{champion:238}}

Issue with CT his champs design are bloated with each ability doing more than one thing that makes dealing with them unfun. But hey let him make another perma banned champ for league's sake.
Oooh you were talking about CT. Thought it was about SolCrushed lmao no way I'm defending CT

> [{quoted}](name=Reav3,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=V1EAGu9k,comment-id=000f0000,timestamp=2018-11-13T20:03:53.669+0000)

Very far off? Aww... I'm interested in the MULTIPLE meta shifts that champ is gonna be responsible for.
Not far enough tbh
What precautions is Riot taking in advance of this new CT champ? Hopefully you guys will already have the nerf hammer ready and waiting.
If we're lucky they'll just release it incredibly underpowered and leave it like that.
Thank god <3 I love his champ designs. The only ones I really play is Akali, but i do dabble in Zyra and Zoe every once in awhile. They're always so cool and bring so much to the game. So fun!
Not fun to play against though.
Has SolCrushed started on anything else with them next week
Please tell me there’ll be teasers between now and then{{sticker:zombie-nunu-tears}}

> [{quoted}](name=Reav3,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=V1EAGu9k,comment-id=000a,timestamp=2018-11-13T17:52:03.471+0000)

So much hidden behind that grin. One can only imagine what's in store for 2019

cough cough 10th anniversary

Finally, we have a date. It's not the release date but it's still something.
Well the reveal is the 19th, so they will go to pbe on the 20th and thus release will be two weeks after that
